non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure (right to be forgotten), Right to restriction of processing
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state the conditions under which the data subject's request to delete their personal data will be granted. It should also specify the timeframe for processing such requests.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Right of access by the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify the timeframe for providing access to personal data, which should be within one month of receiving the request. It should also clarify the process for handling requests for copies of personal data, including any fees that may be charged.
